metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3444 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient data validation in File System API in Google Chrome prior to106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to bypass File System restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page and malicious file. (Chromium security severity:Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
